Sate_Tilted

Sate_Tilted : Sate_Tilted

Sate_Tilted : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

Sate_Tilted : enter / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

Sate_Tilted : enter / #123; StopCarbonation()#59; #125;

Sate_Tilted : enter / #123; StartMalfunctionLedsSequence()#59; #125;

Sate_Tilted : enter / #123; FadeOutAmbiantLight()#59; #125;

state State_AutomaticMode {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as State_AutomaticMode.(InitialState)

        state State_PowerOn {

                State_StandBy

                State_StandBy : State_StandBy

                State_StandBy : enter / #123; FadeOutLeds(LEDS_all)#59; #125;

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as State_PowerOn.(InitialState)

                state State_PowerOn.(ChoicePoint)() <>

                State_Ready

                State_Ready : State_Ready

                State_Ready : enter / #123; FadeInLeds(LEDS_all)#59; #125;

                State_Ready : enter / #123; StartReadyTimer()#59; #125;

                State_Ready : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(true)#59; #125;

                State_ReadyRinseRequired

                State_ReadyRinseRequired : State_ReadyRinseRequired

                State_ReadyRinseRequired : enter / #123; FadeInLeds(LEDS_OrangeWater)#59; #125;

                State_ReadyRinseRequired : enter / #123; StartReadyTimer()#59; #125;

                State_ReadyRinseRequired : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(true)#59; #125;

                State_PowerOnInit

                State_PowerOnInit : State_PowerOnInit

                State_PowerOnInit : enter / #123; LedsOff(LEDS_all)#59; #125;

                State_PowerOnInit : enter / #123; AmbiantLightOff()#59; #125;

        }

        State_Rinsing

        State_Rinsing : State_Rinsing

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(false)#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; FadeOutLeds(LEDS_AllCarbonation)#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; StartRinsingLedSequence()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; pumpStopsOnSensor = true#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(1)#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; StartWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; ResetFilterLifetimeTimer()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; StartWaterPumpingTimer()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; StartUVLEd()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : exit / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(0)#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : exit / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : exit / #123; StopRinsingLedSequence()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : exit / #123; WaterLedOrangeToBlue()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : exit / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

        State_ExitFilteringOnly

        State_ExitFilteringOnly : State_ExitFilteringOnly

        State_ExitFilteringOnly : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(0)#59; #125;

        State_ExitFilteringOnly : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_ExitFilteringOnly : enter / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

        State_ExitFilteringOnly : enter / #123; FadeOutAmbiantLight()#59; #125;

        State_FilteringCarbonationAwait

        State_FilteringCarbonationAwait : State_FilteringCarbonationAwait

        State_FilteringCarbonationAwait : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(false)#59; #125;

        State_FilteringCarbonationAwait : exit / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_FilteringCarbonationAwait : exit / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

        State_Filtering

        State_Filtering : State_Filtering

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; StartWaterFilterLedSequence()#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; FadeInLeds(LEDS_all)#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; FadeInAmbiantLight()#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(1)#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; StartUVLEd()#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; pumpStopsOnSensor = true#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; StartWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; StartWaterPumpingTimer()#59; #125;

        state State_Carbonating {

                Sate_Start_Carbonating

                Sate_Start_Carbonating : Sate_Start_Carbonating

                Sate_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; InitCarbonationOnly()#59; #125;

                Sate_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(false)#59; #125;

                Sate_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; FadeInLeds(LEDS_all)#59; #125;

                Sate_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; FadeInAmbiantLight()#59; #125;

                Sate_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; StartCarbonationLedSequance()#59; #125;

                Sate_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; StartCarbonation()#59; #125;

                Sate_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; carbCycle = 0#59; #125;

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as State_Carbonating.(InitialState)

                Sate_Exit_Carbonating

                Sate_Exit_Carbonating : Sate_Exit_Carbonating

                Sate_Exit_Carbonating : exit / #123; StopCarbonation()#59; #125;

                Sate_Exit_Carbonating : exit / #123; FadeOutAmbiantLight()#59; #125;

                Sate_Exit_Carbonating : exit / #123; FadeInLeds()#59; #125;

                Sate_Carbonating_on

                Sate_Carbonating_on : Sate_Carbonating_on

                Sate_Carbonating_on : enter / #123; StartCarbStageTimer()#59; #125;

                Sate_Carbonating_on : enter / #123; SolenoidPump(1)#59; #125;

                state State_Carbonating.(ChoicePoint)() <>

                Sate_Carbonating_off

                Sate_Carbonating_off : Sate_Carbonating_off

                Sate_Carbonating_off : enter / #123; StartCarbStageTimer()#59; #125;

                Sate_Carbonating_off : enter / #123; SolenoidPump(0)#59; #125;

                Sate_Carbonating_off : exit / #123; carbCycle++#59; #125;

        }

}

Sate_SafetyFail

Sate_SafetyFail : Sate_SafetyFail

Sate_SafetyFail : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

Sate_SafetyFail : enter / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

Sate_SafetyFail : enter / #123; StopCarbonation()#59; #125;

Sate_SafetyFail : enter / #123; StartMalfunctionLedsSequence()#59; #125;

Sate_SafetyFail : enter / #123; FadeOutAmbiantLight()#59; #125;

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

Sate_HWWatchdog

Sate_HWWatchdog : Sate_HWWatchdog

Sate_HWWatchdog : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

Sate_HWWatchdog : enter / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

Sate_HWWatchdog : enter / #123; StopCarbonation()#59; #125;

Sate_HWWatchdog : enter / #123; StartMalfunctionLedsSequence()#59; #125;

Sate_HWWatchdog : enter / #123; FadeOutAmbiantLight()#59; #125;

state Stat_GUIControlMode {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as Stat_GUIControlMode.(InitialState)

        State_InitGuiMode

        State_InitGuiMode : State_InitGuiMode

        State_InitGuiMode : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_InitGuiMode : enter / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

        State_InitGuiMode : enter / #123; LedsOff(LEDS_all)#59; #125;

        State_GuiModeWaitCommands

        State_GuiModeWaitCommands : State_GuiModeWaitCommands

        State_CarbOn

        State_CarbOn : State_CarbOn

        State_CarbOn : enter / #123; SolenoidPump(1)#59; #125;

        State_CarbOff

        State_CarbOff : State_CarbOff

        State_CarbOff : enter / #123; SolenoidPump(0)#59; #125;

        State_WaterPumpOnNoSensor

        State_WaterPumpOnNoSensor : State_WaterPumpOnNoSensor

        State_WaterPumpOnNoSensor : enter / #123; pumpStopsOnSensor = false#59; #125;

        State_WaterPumpOnNoSensor : enter / #123; StartWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_WaterPumpOff

        State_WaterPumpOff : State_WaterPumpOff

        State_WaterPumpOff : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_WaterPumpOff : enter / #123; SendDonePumpOK()#59; #125;

        State_WaterPumpOn

        State_WaterPumpOn : State_WaterPumpOn

        State_WaterPumpOn : enter / #123; pumpStopsOnSensor = true#59; #125;

        State_WaterPumpOn : enter / #123; StartWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_SolenoidPumpPowerOn

        State_SolenoidPumpPowerOn : State_SolenoidPumpPowerOn

        State_SolenoidPumpPowerOn : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(1)#59; #125;

        State_SolenoidPumpPowerOff

        State_SolenoidPumpPowerOff : State_SolenoidPumpPowerOff

        State_SolenoidPumpPowerOff : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(0)#59; #125;

        State_UVLedOn

        State_UVLedOn : State_UVLedOn

        State_UVLedOn : enter / #123; StartUVLEd()#59; #125;

        State_UVLedOff

        State_UVLedOff : State_UVLedOff

        State_UVLedOff : enter / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

        State_Stop

        State_Stop : State_Stop

        State_Stop : enter / #123; SolenoidPump(0)#59; #125;

        State_Stop : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(0)#59; #125;

        State_Stop : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        state Stat_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() <>

        State_StopWaterPump

        State_StopWaterPump : State_StopWaterPump

        State_StopWaterPump : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_StopWaterPump : enter / #123; SendDonePumpOK()#59; #125;

        State_StopWaterPump : enter / #123; pumpStopsOnSensor = false#59; #125;

        State_SendDoneOnStop

        State_SendDoneOnStop : State_SendDoneOnStop

        State_SendDoneOnStop : enter / #123; pumpStopsOnSensor = false#59; #125;

        State_SendDoneOnStop : enter / #123; SendDonePumpOK()#59; #125;

        state Stat_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() <>

}

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)() <>

Sate_Tilted --> Sate_HWWatchdog : Event_HWWatchdog

Sate_Tilted --> Sate_SafetyFail : Event_SafetyFail

Sate_Tilted --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)() : Event_NotTilted

State_AutomaticMode --> Sate_Tilted : Event_TiltDetected

State_AutomaticMode --> Sate_HWWatchdog : Event_HWWatchdog

State_AutomaticMode --> Sate_SafetyFail : Event_SafetyFail

State_AutomaticMode --> Stat_GUIControlMode : Event_Enter_GUI_Controlled_Mode

State_AutomaticMode.(InitialState) --> State_PowerOn

State_PowerOn --> State_Rinsing : Event_LongPressWaterFilter

State_PowerOn --> State_Filtering : Event_ShortPressWaterFilter

State_PowerOn --> State_Carbonating : Event_CarbonationLevelPressed

State_PowerOn.(InitialState) --> State_PowerOnInit

State_PowerOn.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_Ready : else

State_PowerOn.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_ReadyRinseRequired : [IsFirstPowerON() || FilterLifeTimeExpired()]

State_Ready --> State_StandBy : Event_ReadyTimout

State_ReadyRinseRequired --> State_StandBy : Event_ReadyTimout

State_PowerOnInit --> State_PowerOn.(ChoicePoint)() : do

State_Rinsing --> State_Ready : Event_AnyKeyPress

State_Rinsing --> State_Ready : Event_BottleFullSensor

State_Rinsing --> State_Ready : Event_WaterPumpingTimeout

State_ExitFilteringOnly --> State_Ready : do

State_FilteringCarbonationAwait --> State_ExitFilteringOnly : Event_AnyKeyPress

State_FilteringCarbonationAwait --> State_Carbonating : Event_BottleFullSensor

State_FilteringCarbonationAwait --> State_ExitFilteringOnly : Event_WaterPumpingTimeout

State_Filtering --> State_FilteringCarbonationAwait : Event_CarbonationLevelPressed

State_Filtering --> State_ExitFilteringOnly : Event_WaterPumpingTimeout

State_Filtering --> State_ExitFilteringOnly : Event_ShortPressWaterFilter

State_Filtering --> State_ExitFilteringOnly : Event_BottleFullSensor

State_Filtering --> State_ExitFilteringOnly : Event_LongPressWaterFilter

State_Carbonating --> State_Ready : Event_AnyKeyPress

Sate_Start_Carbonating --> Sate_Carbonating_on : do

State_Carbonating.(InitialState) --> Sate_Start_Carbonating

Sate_Exit_Carbonating --> State_Ready : do

Sate_Carbonating_on --> Sate_Carbonating_off : do [CarbonationOnCycleExpired(carbCycle)]

State_Carbonating.(ChoicePoint)() --> Sate_Carbonating_on : else

State_Carbonating.(ChoicePoint)() --> Sate_Exit_Carbonating : [IsCarbonationLastCycle(carbCycle)]

Sate_Carbonating_off --> State_Carbonating.(ChoicePoint)() : do [CarbonationOffCycleExpired(carbCycle)]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> State_AutomaticMode

Stat_GUIControlMode --> State_AutomaticMode : Event_Exit_GUI_Controlled_Mode

Stat_GUIControlMode --> Sate_HWWatchdog : Event_HWWatchdog

Stat_GUIControlMode --> Sate_SafetyFail : Event_SafetyFail

Stat_GUIControlMode.(InitialState) --> State_InitGuiMode

State_InitGuiMode --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> State_SolenoidPumpPowerOn : Event_SolendoidPumpPowerOn

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> State_SolenoidPumpPowerOff : Event_SolendoidPumpPowerOff

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> State_CarbOn : Event_CarbOn

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> State_CarbOff : Event_CarbOff

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> State_WaterPumpOnNoSensor : Event_WaterPumoOnNoSensor

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> State_WaterPumpOn : Event_WarePumpOn

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> State_WaterPumpOff : Event_WaterPumpOff

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> State_UVLedOn : Event_UVLedOn

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> State_UVLedOff : Event_UVLedOff

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> Stat_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() : Event_BottleFullSensor

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> Stat_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() : Event_STOP

State_CarbOn --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_CarbOff --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_WaterPumpOnNoSensor --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_WaterPumpOff --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_WaterPumpOn --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_SolenoidPumpPowerOn --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_SolenoidPumpPowerOff --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_UVLedOn --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_UVLedOff --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_Stop --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

Stat_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_StopWaterPump : [pumpStopsOnSensor]

Stat_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : else

State_StopWaterPump --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_SendDoneOnStop --> State_Stop : do

Stat_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_SendDoneOnStop : [pumpStopsOnSensor]

Stat_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_Stop : else

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_PowerOn.(ChoicePoint)() : else

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)() --> Stat_GUIControlMode : [IsGuiControlMode()]
Events
